SEARCH
Module JBubbleBobble
Package game.model.bubbles

Class BubbleManager

java.lang.Object
game.model.bubbles.BubbleManager
public class BubbleManager extends Object
The BubbleManager class manages the creation, updating, and removal of various types of bubbles in the game, including player bubbles, fireballs, bolts, and water bubbles.

  • Constructor Details

    • BubbleManager

      public BubbleManager(List<Float> bubbleSpawnPoints)
      Constructs a new BubbleManager, initializing the lists for different types of bubbles and the bubble factory.
      Parameters:
      bubbleSpawnPoints - List of spawn points where bubbles can be created.

  • Method Details

    • createPlayerBubble

      public void createPlayerBubble(float x, float y, float xSpeed)
      Creates a new player bubble and adds it to the list of player bubbles.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the bubble.
      y - the y-coordinate of the bubble.
      xSpeed - the speed of the bubble in the x-direction.

    • createSpecialBubble

      public void createSpecialBubble()
      Creates a new special bubble using the bubble factory and adds it to the list of special bubbles.

    • createSpecialBubble

      public void createSpecialBubble(Bubble specialBubble)
      Creates a special bubble from an existing bubble and adds it to the list of special bubbles.
      Parameters:
      specialBubble - The bubble to be turned into a special bubble.

    • createExtendBubble

      public void createExtendBubble()
      Creates and spawns an extend bubble when multiple enemies are killed simultaneously.

    • addBubble

    • updateBubbles

      public void updateBubbles()
      Updates all bubbles managed by this BubbleManager, including special bubbles, player bubbles, fireballs, bolts, and water bubbles. This method also handles the scheduling of special bubble spawns and water bubble updates using timers.
